title: Rock U.S.A. Part 1
brief_description: Part one of a two-part series. Presents an overview of rock music throughout America featuring a strange mixture of artists including early footage of Blondie (Debra Harry) and raw and energetic performances by the Dead Boys, Heart, Mother’s Finest and Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes.
